001package edu.cnm.deepdive.rps.hilt;
002
003import dagger.Module;
004import dagger.Provides;
005import dagger.hilt.InstallIn;
006import dagger.hilt.components.SingletonComponent;
007import java.security.SecureRandom;
008import java.util.Random;
009import org.apache.commons.rng.simple.JDKRandomBridge;
010import org.apache.commons.rng.simple.RandomSource;
011
012/**
013 * Assist Hilt in satisfying dependencies on classes that it cannot otherwise instantiate.
014 */
015@Module
016@InstallIn(SingletonComponent.class)
017public final class RandomModule {
018
019  /**
020   * Creates and returns an instance of {@link Random} (or a subclass) for use when a component
021   * requires a source of randomness as a dependency.
022   */
023  @Provides
024  public Random provideRandom() {
025    return new JDKRandomBridge(RandomSource.XO_RO_SHI_RO_128_PP, null);
026  }
027
028}
